text:
Hi Ali
I managed to get some free time to look at your work.
It certainly looks like you’ve been doing all the right things and heading in the right direction.
I know how hard it can be; I got a runners job at a small company and learnt Maya in the evenings and managed to get work off the back of that. 
Your current examples of work looks good, but you could do with more of it. It would be good to also see the wireframe on shaded with these models.
I would try and just do as many tutorials out there as you can; there’s so much material out there, and at the same time boost your portfolio.  
Getting work in the industry is a tricky one, I aimed at small companies as it seemed easier to find opportunities quickly. It’s good that you know different software as some companies may hire you for a different role such as tracking and you could train more on modeling whilst in that role.
I can also ask other assets artist advice for you, they might have some useful tips.
